stories.Title: To the moon and back
stories.Description: A Japanese space company is set to make a significant impact on lunar exploration. With an investment of over $40 million in its new US subsidiary, ispace aims to launch its Apex 1.0 lander in 2026.
stories.Tweet: To the moon and back 📦 A Japanese space company is set to make a significant impact on lunar exploration. With an investment of over $40 million in its new US subsidiary, ispace aims to launch its Apex 1.0 lander in 2026. #space https://techcrunch.com/2023/09/28/ispace-unveils-new-lunar-lander-that-will-fly-to-the-moon-in-2026/

stories.Title: NASA and SpaceX join forces
stories.Description: October brings many exciting things, and I'm not just talking about Halloween. This powerful duo is gearing up to launch a remarkable mission: NASA's Psyche will soar on October 12.
stories.Tweet: NASA and SpaceX join forces 📦 October brings many exciting things, and I'm not just talking about Halloween. This powerful duo is gearing up to launch a remarkable mission: NASA's Psyche will soar on October 12. #NASA https://interestingengineering.com/science/nasas-psyche-launch-spacex-falcon-heavy

stories.Title: Another step in lunar exploration
stories.Description: China is ready to reach the moon again. The Chang'e-6 mission plans to collect material from the moon's far side, which could offer valuable insight into lunar composition if successful.
stories.Tweet: Another step in lunar exploration 📦 China is ready to reach the moon again. The Chang'e-6 mission plans to collect material from the moon's far side, which could offer valuable insight into lunar composition if successful. #space https://spacenews.com/china-to-attempt-lunar-far-side-sample-return-in-2024/

stories.Title: Control made easy
stories.Description: Most website owners know that chatbots can learn from their data, and Google wants to give them back some control. With Bard's latest feature, they can choose to grant or deny access.
stories.Tweet: Control made easy 📦 Most website owners know that chatbots can learn from their data, and Google wants to give them back some control. With Bard's latest feature, they can choose to grant or deny access. #google https://www.techtimes.com/articles/296956/20230928/google-bard-allows-sites-control-generative-ai-access-training.htm

stories.Title: The future of surgery
stories.Description: One of the most significant fields where AI is making strides is healthcare. Neurology experts in London predict AI-powered brain surgery could become a reality soon.
stories.Tweet: The future of surgery 📦 One of the most significant fields where AI is making strides is healthcare. Neurology experts in London predict AI-powered brain surgery could become a reality soon. #ai https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/brain-surgery-ai-two-years

stories.Title: AI helps with your shopping
stories.Description: Walmart has taken a bold step to enhance the experiences of its employees and customers through AI. The retail giant is demonstrating how this technology makes shopping smarter and more immersive.
stories.Tweet: AI helps with your shopping 📦 Walmart has taken a bold step to enhance the experiences of its employees and customers through AI. The retail giant is demonstrating how this technology makes shopping smarter and more immersive. #ai https://www.axios.com/2023/09/29/walmart-generative-ai

stories.Title: Data from your ears
stories.Description: Did you know your earbuds could do more than play music? Researchers at UC San Diego are fully aware and are working on ones that can monitor brain activity and collect valuable biometric data.
stories.Tweet: Data from your ears 📦 Did you know your earbuds could do more than play music? Researchers at UC San Diego are fully aware and are working on ones that can monitor brain activity and collect valuable biometric data. #science https://www.engadget.com/researchers-developed-3d-printed-sensors-that-can-record-brain-activity-on-earbuds-150000043.html

stories.Title: Hold on to your seats!
stories.Description: A recent leak has become the topic of discussion among Samsung enthusiasts. The Galaxy S24 and S24 Ultra are fully exposed, igniting curiosity and speculation. Check it out for yourself.

stories.Title: C'est la vie
stories.Description: After releasing a patch to meet France's electromagnetic radiation standards, Apple will soon resume sales of its iPhone 12 in the country. That was close.
stories.Tweet: C'est la vie 📦 After releasing a patch to meet France's electromagnetic radiation standards, Apple will soon resume sales of its iPhone 12 in the country. That was close. #apple https://gizmodo.com/france-says-radiation-iphone-12-is-fixed-1850886089

stories.Title: Mark your calendar
stories.Description: There are only a few days left until Made by Google. Although we already know a bit about what's coming thanks to Google itself, I'm sure we'll catch a few surprises. Stay tuned for October 4.
stories.Tweet: Mark your calendar 📦 There are only a few days left until Made by Google. title: China's lunar return, NASA and SpaceX team up, Apple's french journey
description: Eyes must always be on the prize, and China is fully committed to that goal. The country is gearing up for another lunar exploration in 2024. Two well-known giants are collaborating on a very exciting mission. NASA's Psyche is ready to reach orbit aboard a Falcon Heavy rocket. After weeks of speculation and radiation concerns, Apple has finally met France's standards. iPhone 12 users, celebrate!
